content: SDS-Plus Carbide Rebar Hammer Bit Carbide tipped rebar hammer drill bit with SDS-Plus connection end for use in hammer drills. Use hammer drill mode for faster drilling through rebar ### Categories: Home > Products > Tool inserts > Concrete and masonry drill bits ### FEATURES:Features Hammer drill mode allows users to drill through rebar faster than standard rebar cutters Extremely strong carbide tip for increased durability when hammering through rebar Applications Essential for contractors needing to complete rebar projects faster and with Only designed for drilling through rebar, not meant for concrete drilling ### TECHNICAL DATA: ### ITEMS- 3903452 - Rebar Hammer Bit TE-CX 1 x 12 - Package Size 1 pc - 3903447 - Rebar Hammer Bit TE-CX 1/2 x 12 - Package Size 1 pc - 3903448 - Rebar Hammer Bit TE-CX 3/4 x 12 - Package Size 1 pc - 3903451 - Rebar Hammer Bit TE-CX 3/8 x 12 - Package Size 1 pc - 3903449 - Rebar Hammer Bit TE-CX 5/8 x 12 - Package Size 1 pc - 3903450 - Rebar Hammer Bit TE-CX 7/8 x 12 - Package Size 1 pc
